properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 3:03AM EST until January 12 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Burlington VT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of one to
two tenths of an inch.

* WHERE...Western Addison County.

* WHEN...Freezing rain is expected tonight into Sunday morning.
Precipitation will end as a brief period of snow Sunday
afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Isolated power outages and tree damage are possible
due to the ice. Travel could be very difficult tonight into
Sunday owing to icy roads.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain will change to freezing rain overnight
as colder air moves southward across the Champlain Valley. Roads
will become icy after midnight into the early morning hours on
Sunday.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible
power outages.

Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM EST SUNDAY
